code: import{Http}from'@material-ui/icons';import{HttpAuth}from'../../config/Http';export var actionTypes={INDEX_ITEMS:'INDEX_ITEMS',INDEX_LOADING:'ITEMS_LOADING',INDEX_PHOTO:'ITEMS_PHOTO',LOADING_PHOTO:'LAOADING_PHOTO'};export var index=function index(type){return function(dispatch){dispatch({type:actionTypes.INDEX_LOADING,payload:true});dispatch({type:actionTypes.INDEX_ITEMS,payload:[]});return HttpAuth.get('/item/'+type).then(function(response){if(response!==undefined){dispatch({type:actionTypes.INDEX_ITEMS,payload:response.data});dispatch({type:actionTypes.INDEX_LOADING,payload:false});}else{return'algo deu errado.';}});};};export var photo=function photo(id){return function(dispatch){return HttpAuth.get('item/['+id+']/foto').then(function(response){try{dispatch({type:actionTypes.INDEX_PHOTO,payload:response.data});}catch(error){return'Produto sem foto.'+error;}dispatch({type:actionTypes.LOADING_PHOTO,payload:false});});};};
